name: SoccerBall
short_description:
SoccerBall it's a football manager game!
Manage every aspect of your football team:
- Train your team, manage your staff and finances.
- Buy and sell players in the market.
- View players skills, statistics and check fitness and morale.
- Setup your formation and tactics.
- And much more...
summary: SoccerBall it's a football manager game!
